scripts.eject: echo 'WARNING: THIS PROCESS CANNOT BE REVERSED - GIT COMMIT FIRST SO YOU CAN ROLL BACK' && echo && echo 'if you really hate create-react-app this much, manually run:' && echo && echo '                                                            yarn react-scripts eject' && echo
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/* src-tauri/target/* package-lock.json yarn.lock yarn-error-log
scripts.reindex: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/utility/reindex.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:man: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newManikin.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:mem: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newMemory.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:custom: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newCustomMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:ldif: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newLdifMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:network: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newNetworkMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.new:service: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/partmakers/newServiceMite.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.update: rm -rf yarn.lock node_modules/ src-tauri/Cargo.lock && yarn && cd src-tauri && cargo update && cd ..
scripts.bundle: yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/utility/moveBundle.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
scripts.zip: yarn build && yarn prep-tsnode-script && yarn ts-node src/scripts/utility/webzip.ts && yarn cleanup-tsnode-script
